desc.cn: Sherlock 是 Sherlock Project 提供的功能强大的命令行工具，可用于在许多社交网络中查找用户名
desc.en: Sherlock, a powerful command line tool provided by Sherlock Project, can be used to find usernames across many social networks

/pip.cmd:
git clone https://github.com/sherlock-project/sherlock.git \
&& cd sherlock \
&& python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt
